name: bulkgenerateguids
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool guid_generator.
Tool description: The API that generates random GUIDs.
API description: Generates a bulk of GUIDs (Globally Unique Identifiers) using the GUID Generator API.

batch_size.description: The number of GUIDs to return. Must be between 1 and 10000. If the parameter is not provided, the default batch size is 20.
